sentences.sContent: Accept the fact that we have to treat almost anybody as a volunteer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Accept the fact that we have to treat almost anybody as a volunteer.
sentences.sCn: 请接受这样的事实，我们必须将几乎每个人当作一个志愿者。

sentences.sContent: Therefore, let us enjoy the time when serving as a volunteer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Therefore, let us enjoy the time when serving as a volunteer.
sentences.sCn: 因此，让我们好好享受作为一个志愿者的时间吧。

remMethod.val: volunt(志愿) + eer(人) → 志愿者

words.tran: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tranOther: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
